Ruby on Rails v3.0.3
Class
ActiveSupport::Cache::Strategy::LocalCache::LocalStore
In: activesupport/lib/active_support/cache/strategy/local_cache.rb:
Parent: ActiveSupport::Cache::Store

Simple memory backed cache. This cache is not thread safe and is intended only for serving as a temporary memory cache for a single thread.

Methods
  • clear
  • delete_entry
  • new
  • read_entry
  • write_entry
